results.title: Agriculture and Food Research Initiative  Strengthening Agricultural Systems
results.agency: National Institute of Food and Agriculture
results.reason: Strong AI and robotics expertise for agricultural automation and pest detection; limited coverage of food safety, soil health, and farmer economics.

results.title: ROSES25: C.12 Foundational Artificial Intelligence for the Moon and Mars
results.reason: Faculty expertise in robotics and machine learning partially overlaps with space AI, but lacks domain-critical space systems knowledge.

results.title: Pilot Program to Increase Research Capacity at  Historically Black Colleges and Universities and Other Minority-Serving Institutions
results.agency: Dept of the Army -- Materiel Command
results.reason: AI robotics expertise partially aligns with Army research interests; limited institutional capacity coverage.

results.title: Postdoctoral Research Fellowships in Biology
results.reason: AI algorithms and complex systems analysis present, but biotechnology domain expertise absent.

results.title: Research Initiatives at the Naval Postgraduate School
results.reason: Faculty expertise in robotics and AI lacks administrative grant management and compliance capabilities.

results.title: Agriculture and Food Research Initiative Competitive Grants Program Education and Workforce Development
results.agency: National Institute of Food and Agriculture
results.reason: Faculty expertise in robotics and agricultural AI lacks educational program design and workforce development capabilities.

results.title: CyberAICorps Scholarship for Service
